name: vscode-deploy-reloaded
description: Deploys files of a workspace to a destination.

commands.description: Registers one or more commands for the editor.

\\S+.description: The ID of the command to register.

button.description: Defines a button for the status bar.

isRight.description: Put button on the right side or not.

show.description: Show button at beginning or not.

noFirstArgument.description: Do not submit a context object as first argument.

clearOutputOnStartup.description: Clear output on after config has been reloaded or not.

deployOnChange.description: Activates or deactivates 'deploy on change' feature for all packages.

deployOnSave.description: Activates or deactivates 'deploy on save' feature for all packages.

importVarsAsPlaceholders.description: Automatically import environment variables as placesholders / values.

vars.description: One or more variables for the process to define.

globals.description: Global data to define, which can be access by scripts, e.g.

ignore.description: One or more pattern of files that should be ignored even if a deploy is started for them.

items.description: The patterns of files that should be ignored even if a deploy is started for them.

imports.description: Defines of or more JSON files with settings to import.

oneOf.description: The path (or URI) to the source of the import file.

from.description: The path (or URI) to the source of the import file.

if.description: (JavaScript) Code that should be invoked, to check, if settings are available or not.

oneOf.description: One or more JSON files to import.
The path (or URI) to the source of the import file.

from.description: The path (or URI) to the source of the import file.

if.description: (JavaScript) Code that should be invoked, to check, if settings are available or not.

language.description: The custom ID of the language to use (e.g. 'en', 'de').

openOutputOnStartup.description: Open the output window after config has been reloaded or not.

packages.description: One or more packages to define.

oneOf.description: Indicates if a button should be created for that package in the status bar or not.
Defines a button for the status bar.

command.description: The custom ID for the command.

isRight.description: Put button on the right side or not.

deployOnChange.description: Defines if 'deploy on change' should be used for that package.

oneOf.description: Defines if 'deploy on change' feature should be used for that packages, by using its file defintions and targets.

items.description: The names of one or more custom targets to deploy to.

exclude.description: One or more (glob) patterns, that describe what files should be EXCLUDED.

files.description: One or more (glob) patterns, that describe what files should be EXCLUDED.

deployOnSave.description: Defines if 'deploy on save' should be used for that package.

oneOf.description: Defines if 'deploy on save' feature should be used for that packages, by using its file defintions and targets.

items.description: The names of one or more custom targets to deploy to.

exclude.description: One or more (glob) patterns, that describe what files should be EXCLUDED.

files.description: One or more (glob) patterns, that describe what files should be EXCLUDED.

exclude.description: A list of one or more (glob) patterns of files, that should be execluded from deployment.

files.description: A list of one or more (glob) patterns of files that should be deployed. By default ALL files will be deployed.

if.description: (JavaScript) Code, which indicates, if entry is available or not.

platforms.description: One or more platform names the package is available for.

removeOnChange.description: Defines if 'remove on change' should be used for that package.

oneOf.description: Defines if 'remove on change' feature should be used for that packages, by using its file defintions and targets.

exclude.description: One or more (glob) patterns, that describe what files should be EXCLUDED.

files.description: One or more (glob) patterns, that describe what files should be EXCLUDED.
